Returns: An instance of @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession_E@, or null if an error occurred.
Parameters: @B_android#content#Context_E@
Context: The @B_android#content#Context_E@ to use. This value must never be null.
@B_java#util#concurrent#Executor_E@
Executor: The executor on which you wish to execute callbacks. This value must never be null.
int
int: The subscription ID to use.
@B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsStreamingSessionCallback_E@
MbmsStreamingSessionCallback: A callback object on which you wish to receive results of asynchronous operations. This value must never be null.
create(android.content.Context,java.util.Description: Create a new @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession_E@ using the given subscription ID. Note that this call will bind a remote service. You may not call this method on your app's main thread. You may only have one instance of @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession_E@ per UID. If you call this method while there is an active instance of @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession_E@ in your process (in other words, one that has not had @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession#close_E@ called on it), this method will throw an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@. If you call this method in a different process running under the same UID, an error will be indicated via @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsStreamingSessionCallback#onError_E@. Note that initialization may fail asynchronously. If you wish to try again after you receive such an asynchronous error, you must call @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession#close_E@ on the instance of @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession_E@ that you received before calling this method again.
create(android.content.Context,java.util.FullName: public static MbmsStreamingSession create (Context context, Executor executor, int subscriptionId, MbmsStreamingSessionCallback callback)

Parameters: @B_java#util#List_E@
List: A list of streaming service classes that the app would like updates on. The exact names of these classes should be negotiated with the wireless carrier separately.
requestUpdateStreamingServices(java.util.Description: An inspection API to retrieve the list of streaming media currently be advertised. The results are returned asynchronously via @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsStreamingSessionCallback#onStreamingServicesUpdated_E@ on the callback provided upon creation. Multiple calls replace the list of service classes of interest. May throw an @B_java#lang#IllegalArgumentException_E@ or an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@.

close().Description: Terminates this instance. Also terminates any streaming services spawned from this instance as if @B_android#telephony#mbms#StreamingService#close_E@ had been called on them. After this method returns, no further callbacks originating from the middleware will be enqueued on the provided instance of @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsStreamingSessionCallback_E@, but callbacks that have already been enqueued will still be delivered. It is safe to call @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession#create_E@ to obtain another instance of @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession_E@ immediately after this method returns. May throw an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@

Returns: An instance of @B_android#telephony#mbms#StreamingService_E@ through which the stream can be controlled. May be null if an error occurred.
Parameters: @B_android#telephony#mbms#StreamingServiceInfo_E@
StreamingServiceInfo: The information about the service to stream.
@B_java#util#concurrent#Executor_E@
Executor: The executor on which you wish to execute callbacks for this stream. This value must never be null.
@B_android#telephony#mbms#StreamingServiceCallback_E@
StreamingServiceCallback: A callback that'll be called when something about the stream changes.
startStreaming(android.telephony.mbms.St.Description: Starts streaming a requested service, reporting status to the indicated callback. Returns an object used to control that stream. The stream may not be ready for consumption immediately upon return from this method -- wait until the streaming state has been reported via @B_android#telephony#mbms#StreamingServiceCallback#onStreamStateUpdated_E@ May throw an @B_java#lang#IllegalArgumentException_E@ or an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@ Asynchronous errors through the callback include any of the errors in @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#GeneralErrors_E@ or @B_android#telephony#mbms#MbmsErrors#StreamingErrors_E@.
startStreaming(android.telephony.mbms.St.FullName: public StreamingService startStreaming (StreamingServiceInfo serviceInfo, Executor executor, StreamingServiceCallback callback)

ClassDesc: This class provides functionality for streaming media over MBMS.
